short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Running Monster is a new, trend game - copy of the most popular game Running Dinosaur, but with new design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Welcome to 2021! Play Running Corona with new skins and design without downloading. Control your corona with arrow keys.
Arcade game always in your browser for playing in school and at home.
New HTML version of running t-rex saga games
Enjoy playing
long.en,en_AU:
Play Running Monster Hunter with new skins and design without downloading. Control your monster with arrow keys.
Another way of playing running dinosaur game is playing this game , it is newer and interesting for "old school" players.
Arcade game always in your browser for playing in school and at home.
New HTML version of running running saga games
Enjoy playing
